message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $10,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $7,500 is quite a bit lower than I can go.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $9,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,200 for the product.
